mapper.select: select a.ac_no,a.a_no,a.user_no,u.user_name,a.ac_content, date_format(a.ac_regdate,"%Y/%m/%e %l:%i") as ac_regdate from answer_comm a inner join userinfo u on a.user_no = u.user_no where a.a_no = #{a_no};

select ac.ac_no,a.q_no,ac.a_no,ac.user_no,u.user_name,ac.ac_content,ac.ac_regdate from answer a inner join answer_comm ac inner join userinfo u on a.a_no = ac.a_no and ac.user_no = u.user_no where a.q_no = #{q_no};
